job.title: je
job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-14T17:14:38.000Z", "description": "

*** We are considering Junior and Experienced Developers at this time ***


*** We cannot provide Visa Sponsorship at this time ***


Aegis Software is seeking talented software developers to join our team for the continued development of the company\u2019s commercial software products. This includes enhancing, customizing and providing maintenance support for the companies\u2019 entire product suite.


Candidates should have a passion for software development using the latest and greatest technologies. Our customers and market demand continual improvement through proper code structure, regular code reviews, and thorough testing on everything we produce. This ensures Aegis offers the best functionality to our customers while maintaining performance in high transaction manufacturing environments.


Responsibilities


\u00b7       Participating and contributing to department and company initiatives.

\u00b7       Working with Development Manager and Lead Engineers to get work assignments.

\u00b7       Learning the codebase and improving your coding skills

\u00b7       Writing and maintaining code to company coding standards

\u00b7       Working on minor bug fixes.

\u00b7       Coordinating with Aegis\u2019 global service team to diagnose and correct software defects reported from the field

\u00b7       Ability to work from a specification through Aegis custom engineering process with assistance from senior developers.

\u00b7       Enhancing the existing Aegis product suite with a strong focus on the end user scenarios and requirements

\u00b7  Working to build understanding of manufacturing industry (including manufacturing standards, jargon, operations)


Requirements


  • Bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or another related field.
  • 1+ years of experience with Object Orientated Programming Language (C# Preferred)
  • Exposure to one or more of Aegis leveraged technologies (C#, DevXpress, WCF, WPF, MVVM, SQL, LINQ)
  • Knowledge of databases and operating systems.
  • Good working knowledge of email systems and Microsoft Office software.
  • Ability to learn new software and technologies quickly.
  • Ability to follow instructions and work in a team environment.
  • Detail-oriented.
  • Travel Requirements \u2013 up to 10%
